body: In preparation for the name changing update Mojang is expected to release on February 4th, there may be some brief downtime in the next hour to make some changes to our backend. It shouldn't take longer than 10 minutes if anything. Just a warning!
body_tagged: In preparation for the name changing update Mojang is expected to release on February 4th, there may be some brief downtime in the next hour to make some changes to our backend. It shouldn't take longer than 10 minutes if anything. Just a warning!

replies.body: Maintenance undergoing now instead, as some issues have occurred with name changing.

replies.body: Quick question. I assume this'll have our old accounts statistics moved over to the new username. Right?
replies.body_tagged: Quick question. I assume this'll have our old accounts statistics moved over to the new username. Right?

replies.body: We hope so. As it stands the stats are cleared if the user decided to change letters and numbers. Capitalization doesn't impact it however.
replies.body_tagged: We hope so. As it stands the stats are cleared if the user decided to change letters and numbers. Capitalization doesn't impact it however.
